name: The Crowded Room
overview: In 1979 Manhattan, a young man is arrested for a shocking crime — and an unlikely investigator must solve the mystery behind it.
tagline: The facts are never the whole story.

episodes.name: Exodus
episodes.overview: Danny Sullivan is arrested for a violent crime. Rya Goodwin probes his troubled past for answers.

episodes.name: Sanctuary
episodes.overview: Rya visits the Ghost House. Danny opens up about his turbulent friendship with Ariana.

episodes.name: Murder
episodes.overview: Danny gets a gift for Ariana. Annabelle returns. Rya pieces together the events leading up to Rockefeller Center.

episodes.name: London
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the shooting, Danny flees the country to find his father.

episodes.name: Savior
episodes.overview: Danny’s and Candy’s lives are forever changed by the arrival of an unlikely savior.

episodes.name: Rya

episodes.name: The Crowded Room
episodes.overview: Danny finally faces the truth about his crime.

episodes.name: Reunion
